Package com.qtplaf.library.swing.action

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ActionCloseFrame
    Close a frame.
    ActionLookup
    An action to lookup a list of records, select one of them and update the referred components.
    ActionSearchAndRefresh
    Action aimed to search values to refresh edit fields, normally executed as a value action.
    ActionSearchAndRefreshDB  
    ActionSelectColumns
    Action to select columns from a JtableRecord.
    ActionSortTable
    Action to define an order and sort a JtableRecord.
    ActionTableOption
    Action used in an option dialog or frame which main component is a JPanelTableRecord, giving access to the table, the model and the selected records.
